basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Lee Beasley Pre-Dental Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Biology or Chemistry with the intent to continue their education to obtain a dental degree. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Biology or Chemistry major Student must be completing 75 hours Intent to continue education to obtain a dental degree 3.0 GPA or above Two letters of faculty recommendation/support

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
